items.title: SEBI opens special six-month window for transfer of physical shares that missed earlier deadline
items.description: The window will open on July 7 and close on January 6, 2026.

items.title: Sigachi blast exposes recurring safety failures and worker deaths in Indian factories
items.description: While the investigation into the June 30 blast is underway, the company said on Wednesday that it was not a reactor explosion.

items.title: HDB Financial Services shares close 14% higher than IPO price; valued at Rs 69,758 crore post-debut day
items.description: HDB Financial Services recorded a market capitalisation of Rs 69,758.3 crore by the end of its debut day.

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Top 10 stocks that moved the most on July 2
items.description: Top gainers & losers: Indian stock markets ended the session in the deep red on July 2, buoyed by multiple factors.

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty below 25,500, Sensex down 288 pts; metals outperform
items.description: Among sectors, metal index was up 1.4 percent, Consumer Durables index added 1 percent, while PSU bank, capital goods, realty, media, power were down 0.4-1.4 percent. The BSE midcap and smallcap index shed 0.2 percent each.

items.title: SBI Cards shares drop 2% after Goldman Sachs downgrades stock to 'Neutral'
items.description: SBI Cards share price: The stock has seen massive rally recently, surging over 30% in the past six months and hitting a fresh 52-week high of Rs 1,027 apiece earlier last month.

items.title: Tata Communications shares jump 5% after Macquarie says stock may double in 3 years
items.description: Tata Communications share price: Macquarie initiated coverage on the stock with an 'Outperform' rating and a target price of Rs 2,300 per share

items.title: HDB Financial delivers biggest listing gains among over Rs 10,000-crore IPOs post-Covid
items.description: 3 out of 4 IPOs, which raised over Rs 10,000 crore after the COVID-19 outbreak in 2020, saw a discount listing.

items.title: RBL Bank shares drop 2% after lender denies report on Dubai-based Emirates NBD Bank eying minority stake
items.description: RBL Bank share price: The shares of the lender have now snapped a four-day gaining streak.

items.title: Active vs Passive Investing Explained: Which Strategy Is Right for You?
items.description:
Confused between active and passive investing?  This video breaks down the key differences between these two popular investment strategies—so you can decide which one fits your financial goals best.
We’ll explain how actively managed mutual funds differ from passively managed ones like ETFs, what role fund managers play, and how expense ratios, risk, and returns compare. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned investor, this guide will help you make smarter investment decisions.

items.title: Multibagger PSU stock jumps over 7% on bagging orders worth crores
items.description: RITES shares have delivered multibagger returns, rising 152.32 percent in the past three years. On the NSE, more than 2.13 crore shares changed hands today.

items.title: SEBI in talks with Google, Telegram to crack down on unregistered finfluencers: Sources
items.description: Sources said there will be unprecedented enforcement action against unregistered finfluencers who are misusing social media platforms. Investor protection through awareness and education is the key focus area for the current regime at SEBI.

items.title: Rs 227 crore: Total cost for making HDB Financial Services a listed entity
items.description: The cumulative expense includes Rs 104 crore, which merchant bankers earned as fee for managing the IPO

items.title: Subscribe for Crizac Ltd IPO; Choice Equity Broking
items.description: Choice Equity Broking, has come out with its report on Crizac Ltd. The research firm has recommended to “ Subscribe” the ipo in its research report as on July 01, 2025.

items.title: Newly-listed shares see profit booking a day after market debut; Kalpataru, Globe Civil, Ellenbarrie fall up to 5%
items.description: After their respective market debut, the shares of Kalpataru, Globe Civil Projects and Ellenbarrie Industrial Gases had closed significantly higher in the green on July 1. The stocks have now pared strong gains to trade in the red on July 2.

items.title: Gabriel India: Unlocking new doors of opportunities
items.description: The company recently announced a demerger scheme. This move will transform Gabriel from a single product company into a highly diversified mobility solutions provider.

items.title: Subscribe for Crizac Ltd IPO; Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services, has come out with its report on Crizac Ltd. The research firm has recommended to “ Subscribe” the ipo in its research report as on July 01, 2025.

items.title: Crizac Ltd IPO — Is this EdTech flotation worth the bet?
items.description: Tech-driven, asset-light B2B platform targeting global student mobility, with efforts underway to reduce UK dependence

items.title: Sambhv Steel Tubes shares make strong market debut, close 19% higher than IPO price
items.description: Sambhv Steel Tubes share price: 'Investors must remember that post-listing performance will hinge on delivery and earnings progression, not sentiment alone,' said Bhavik Joshi from INVasset PMS.
